attributes.action: Stop welsh being compulsory in welsh secondary schools for Key stage four
attributes.additional_details: Out of the population of wales only 15% consider themselves as fluent welsh speakers.
attributes.background: Welsh Is compulsory in Key stage four for welsh students, welsh is now a scarcely used language and however I believe it should be optional I think it should be taken off the compulsory curriculum.

rejection.details:
our petition is about something that the National Assembly for Wales is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Welsh Assembly has its own  Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Assembly, you can find out more here:

http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
